uvi.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.10.46
uvi.description:
netfilter: synproxy: Fix out of bounds when parsing TCP options

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.46 by commit 9cdf299ba4e153b5e56187648420de22c6216f02, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit 48b1de4c110a7afa4b85862f6c75af817db26fad. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netfilter: synproxy: Fix out of bounds when parsing TCP options
